about_the_game:
Welcome to SuperDucks – a dynamic 2D platformer-puzzle game!

Get ready for an exciting adventure where every level is a serious challenge!
Explore a world full of vibrant and dark tours, solve complex puzzles, and overcome obstacles! Only the best can complete all levels and showcase their mastery. Ready for the challenge?
Choose one of seven ducks with special abilities and overcome diverse tours, from bright and colorful to dark and mysterious. Complete all levels and prove you are a true master!

Game Features:


1. 7 unique ducks: Each duck has special abilities to help you find unexpected solutions and overcome any obstacles.

2. A world full of diversity: Explore levels with unique styles and atmospheres, where each level is different from the last.

3. Original puzzles: Use the ducks' abilities to solve engaging tasks and overcome challenging trials.

4. Intuitive controls and bright graphics: Easy-to-learn controls and colorful graphics make each adventure unforgettable.

🎁 Buy the game now and get free access to all future updates!


Get access to all current levels and modes and be the first to enjoy all future updates, including new levels, modes, and content. Don't miss your chance to be part of our exciting world and always stay on top of the latest adventures!
detailed_description:
Meet the major update for SuperDucks!

We are excited to tell you about the following updates that will significantly expand your adventures in the world of SuperDucks! Here’s what awaits you:
🗝️ New levels: 4, 5, and 6!
🌐 Multiplayer mode: Play with friends up to 7 people!

Cooperative Play:

Complete levels as a team, solving puzzles and overcoming obstacles together.

Interaction:

Use the abilities of the ducks for clever solutions together.

Team Challenges:

Face new challenges designed for multiplayer play and demonstrate team mastery.

🎁 Buy the game now and get free access to all future updates!


Get access to all current levels and modes and be the first to enjoy all future updates, including new levels, modes, and content. Don’t miss the chance to be part of our exciting world and always be up-to-date with the latest adventures!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.11.x
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or higher (requires Metal)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: SuperDucks

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E8400, 3.0GHz or AMD Athlon 64 X2 6000+, 3.0GHz or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 9600 GT or AMD HD 3870 512MB or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 11

short_description: Welcome to SuperDucks – a dynamic 2D platformer-puzzle game! Choose one of seven unique ducks with special abilities and embark on an exciting journey through dark and vibrant levels. Solve puzzles, overcome obstacles, and enjoy the unique style of each tour!
